name: Fallout4Trivia
0:
”Alexa open fallout four trivia”
”Alexa tell fallout four trivia to start a game”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fallout four trivia
Developer Terms of Use
des: This is an unofficial Fallout 4 trivia game, meant to test your knowledge of all different aspects of the game. Answers are multiple choice, say the number of the answer to guess. All sounds and icons are owned by and belong to Bethesda Softworks. I claim no credit for any intellectual property or assets used in this skill
